meanings.definition: Singing a lullaby to someone to help them fall asleep.
meanings.sent1: She was lullabying her baby with a sweet song.
meanings.sent2: Every night, the mother enjoys lullabying her child to sleep.
meanings.sent3: The cat was lullabying the kittens with a purring melody.
meanings.sent4: The gentle wind lullabying the leaves to rest.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the waves lullabying the beach at night was calming.

meanings.definition: The act of soothing someone with a lullaby.
meanings.sent1: The lullabying of the mother helped the baby sleep peacefully.
meanings.sent2: The soft lullabying in the room created a peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected lullabying from the birds made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The lullabying of the violin brought comfort to the listeners' hearts.
meanings.sent5: The gentle lullabying of the rain on the roof was a soothing sound.
